# daily.dev Public API

> LLM-friendly documentation for the daily.dev API

This API provides access to personalized developer content feeds. It requires a Plus subscription and Personal Access Token.

## Documentation

- **Quick Start & Examples**: https://api.daily.dev/public/v1/skill.md
- **OpenAPI Specification (JSON)**: https://api.daily.dev/public/v1/docs/json
- **OpenAPI Specification (YAML)**: https://api.daily.dev/public/v1/docs/yaml

## Authentication

All API requests require a Bearer token:
```
Authorization: Bearer dda_your_token_here
```

Tokens are created at https://app.daily.dev/settings/api (requires Plus subscription).

## Base URL

```
https://api.daily.dev/public/v1
```
